Among SpaceX's many achievements, the launch of the Falcon 9 and Falcon Heavy rockets, as well as the historic achievement of landing and reusing these rockets, are particularly notable.

In 2004, Elon Musk joined the board of Tesla Motors (now Tesla, Inc.), an electric vehicle and clean energy company.
